message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a bargain price of $200.  I think you'll agree it's a steal!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Can you meet me at that price?
